doc.field: NYS Board of Mediation agendas, case materials, correspondence, history, memos, minutes, notes, statistics. Clippings (1961). "The Crisis of the American Trade Union Movement," report by Solomon Barkin. Dept. of Labor annual reports and materials. Grievance procedure, managerial philosophy, ethical culture, and pamphlets. Urban League for Greater New York materials. Union newspapers. Labor law materials. Labor and Civil Rights materials. National Academy of Arbitrators publications.
